problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was surprised when there were two repairmen, a Caucasian man and a Hispanic man, who showed up to change the lightbulbs in my bedroom. It isn't a two person job. The Caucasian man did all the work, the Hispanic just watched and messed around on his phone.
Question: Who did the work?
ans0: Not enough info
ans1: The Caucasian man
ans2: The Hispanic man
